豨字的基本解释

豨
xī
〔豨莶〕一年生草本植物，茎上有灰白色的毛，叶对生，椭圆形或卵形。
古书上指猪。

豨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》香依切，平微，曉。］
［《廣韻》虚豈切，上尾，曉。］
亦作“狶1”。
(1)猪。
(2)象声词。表示叹息声。

豨字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豕字部】　豨； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1196第29
【唐韻】虛豈切【集韻】【韻會】許豈切，?希上聲。【玉篇】豕也。【莊子·知北遊】監市履豨。【註】豨，大豕也。　又【廣韻】楚人呼豬也。【揚子·太?經】豨毅其牙。【註】豨，人呼豬也。　又【說文】豕走豨豨。【正韻】豕走聲也。【前漢·食貨志】王莽大募天下囚徒、人奴，名曰豬突豨勇。【師古曰】東方名豕曰狶。一曰豨，豕走也。　又封豨，神獸。【說文】古有封豨修蛇之害。【楚辭·天問】封豨是射。【註】神獸也。　又封豨，星名。詳前豕字註。　又?豨，人名。見【史記·列傳】。　又【廣韻】香衣切【集韻】【韻會】香依切，?音希。豬也。【揚子·方言】南楚謂之豨。　又藥名。【韓愈·進學解】訾醫師以昌陽引年，欲進其豨苓也。互詳豕字註。　又【本草綱目】豨薟，一名豬膏母。【李時珍曰】楚人呼豬爲豨，呼草之氣味辛毒爲薟。此草氣臭如豬而味薟螫，故名。　【廣韻】亦作狶。

暂无。

pig
Basic explanation of words
pig
xī
〔Sichuan Siegesbeckia〕 is an annual herb with off-white hairs on the stem, opposite leaves, oval or ovoid.
Ancient books refer to pigs.
pig
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" Xiang Yiqie, Ping Wei, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Qiqi, Shangwei, Xiao. ]
Also known as "狶1".
(1) Pig.
(2) Onomatopoeia. Indicates a sigh.
pig

[Shigu said] The eastern name hog said 狶. One said hog, hog walks too.　Fengfeng again, mythical beast. [Said the text] In ancient times, there was the harm of sealing and repairing snakes. [Chu Ci·Tian Wen] Feng Xun is shooting. [Note] Mythical beasts are also.　Feng Feng again, star name. Please refer to the previous hog word note.　 Again? He, the name of the person. See 【Historical Records·Biography】.　[Guangyun] Xiangyiqi [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Xiangyiqi,? Yinxi. Pig too. [Yangtze Dialect] Southern Chu is known as "Hun".　Also the name of the medicine. [Han Yu·Jinxue Jie] Physician Zi used Changyang to lead the year, and wanted to enter Ziling. Mutual detailed hog word note.　[Compendium of Materia Medica] Siegesbeckia, a pig ointment mother. [Li Shizhen said] Chu people called pigs as pigs, and the pungent smell of grasses as siege. This grass smells like pigs and stings, hence the name.　【Guangyun】also used as 狶.
